item.title: Menacing proliferation of three-wheelers in Dhaka City
item.description: The proliferation of auto-rickshaws has reached the tipping point where their earlier version of pedal rickshaws is on the verge of vanishing from the scene. Electricity stored in a battery pack through charging turns a motor into mechanical power to drive the three-wheelers. This is why the vehicl

item.title: Retired officials from 25 BCS cadres demand retrospective promotion, citing discrimination
item.description: Retired officials from 25 Bangladesh Civil Service (BCS) cadres -- all except the administration cadre -- have demanded promotions and equal benefits, alleging discrimination in government service. They also called for an ordinance based on key recommendations of the Public Administration Reform C

item.title: Bangladesh seaports on alert as low intensifies into depression over Bay of Bengal
item.description: The low-pressure area over the southeast Bay of Bengal and adjoining areas has intensified, first into a well-marked low and subsequently into a depression, according to the Bangladesh Meteorological Department (BMD). The BMD warned on Saturday that the weather system might escalate further and tu

item.title: Put aside differences, join polls: Fakhrul to all parties
item.description: BNP Secretary General Mirza Fakhrul Islam Alamgir on Saturday urged all political parties to take part in the upcoming national election, putting aside minor differences, to help restore the democratic process in the country. "I call upon all political parties to join the coming election by puttin

item.title: Beximco Pharma provides access to breakthrough treatment for cystic fibrosis patients worldwide
item.description: Cystic fibrosis (CF) is a rare but life-threatening genetic disorder with very low life expectancy. Globally, an estimated 189,000 people are suffering from CF, of whom only 60% are diagnosed and just 27% receive treatment. Trikafta from US-based Vertex Pharmaceuticals, is a breakthrough triple com

item.title: Southeast University welcomes Fall 2025 freshers with grand orientation programmes
item.description: Southeast University (SEU) warmly welcomed newly admitted students of the Fall 2025 Semester through a freshers’ reception and orientation programmes held on October 23, 2025, at the university’s Multipurpose Hall.
